title: Question:
author: Frank AlpenCoin
content: Hi,Was thinking what is the best for you. Should I publish all the addresses? if yes where? bitcointalk, pdf, alpencoin.ch, pastebin.com ... What if the website goes down?Satori had a pdf on the website.There is pros and cons.    Feel free to comment.Thanks

comments.author: tldr-hodl
comments.body: Personally, I'm not much aware of the cons, and if I may as collector, what I appreciate most is a complete database like https://status.denarium.comNot just addresses, but also photos, how many of each release were made (can't believe how often this simple info is extremely hard to find, I'm looking at you Polymerbit!!!), everything...And of course, if all the info is also available for download as .xls, even better.Just my 2 sats.

comments.author: goldlyre
comments.body: A best thing is that somebody build a website similar to the casasciustracker.com

comments.author: tweetious
comments.body: pdf linked to the website & also post them at the "MASTER MAKER/ADDRESS/LISTS OF LISTS!!!" pinned topic -bitcointalk collectibles section-

comments.author: Kryptowerk
comments.body: Personally I think the easiest and most secure option is to publish it here and/or via pastebin.If somebody wants to build a tracker (website, app etc) on top of that data, that's great but not necessary.Problem with any website is, that it can go down again or can be manipulated. Problem with pdf are certain security concerns, afaik pdf is a format that can enable malicious fishing or even hacking attempts - so some malicious actor could create a pdf with the same name and try to spread it.

comments.author: cygan
comments.body: @Frank AlpenCoin i would definitely do this and publish all your serials and the corresponding BTC addresses here.minerjones has also created an extra thread for this and always maintains it sporadically - i just saw that the Icarus timeline series does not yet appear there [INFO/REFERENCE] MASTER MAKER/ADDRESS/LISTS OF LISTS!!!

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: you do have a way to look them up on your site but having something that also gave all the mintages or was a good back up in case you ever took your site down would be helpful.

comments.author: anonymousminer
comments.body: websites can go down or be left unmaintained... trackers may end up with the same fate.  i'd put the list multiple places to help the secondary market and the collectors of your items.  the more you do the better IMO.post a thread here in collectibles.  add to the master maker address list.add a link to the website.  send the list to minerjones for safekeeping.
